edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands

Class GitCommitOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands.GitCommitOptions

  • public class GitCommitOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage passing commit arguments to the GitCommit command.

      • setOptAll

        public void setOptAll(boolean optAll)
        Set the --all option. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the only or include options are set.
        Parameters:
        optAll - True to set the --all option, false to unset it.

      • setOptInclude

        public void setOptInclude(boolean optInclude)
        Set the --include option. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the all option is set.
        Parameters:
        optInclude - True to set the --include option, false to unset it.

      • setOptNoVerify

        public void setOptNoVerify(boolean optNoVerify)
        Set the --no-verify option.
        Parameters:
        optNoVerify - True to set the --no-verify option, false to unset it.

      • setOptOnly

        public void setOptOnly(boolean optOnly)
        Set the --only option. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the all option is set.
        Parameters:
        optOnly - True to set the --only option, false to unset it.

      • setOptSignoff

        public void setOptSignoff(boolean optSignoff)
        Set the --signoff option.
        Parameters:
        optSignoff - True to set the --signoff option, false to unset it.
